SEARCH
Package src.team

Class Athlete

java.lang.Object
src.team.Statistics
src.team.Athlete
public class Athlete extends Statistics
The Athlete class represents a player in the team. It extends the Statistics class and provides methods and attributes for managing the athlete's information, such as name, position, stamina, injuries, value, and equipped items.
